quotes.name: Amy Morin
quotes.quote: The more you practice tolerating discomfort, the more confidence you'll gain in your ability to accept new challenges.

quotes.name: Dale Carnegie
quotes.quote: It isn't what you have, or who you are, or where you are, or what you are doing that makes you happy or unhappy. It is what you think about.

quotes.name: Christopher Reeve
quotes.quote: Some people are walking around with full use of their bodies and they are more paralysed than I am.
